items.sentence: I don\'t think we should be talking to each other.
Tom found that his vacation ended all too quickly.
Tom knew more about what happened than he told us.
Tom knew why Mary wanted to borrow thirty dollars.
It wasn\'t easy for me to convince Tom to do that.
Tom peeked out the door to see what was happening.
Did you find the things that you were looking for?
Everybody on the bus was asleep except the driver.
Malaria kills more than 400,000 people every year.
Tom and Mary remained friends after they broke up.
